sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import Card from "../components/card" import FormGroup from "../components/form-group" import UsuarioService from "../app/service/usuarioService" import {mensagemErro, mensagemSucesso} from '../components/toastr' class CadastroUsuario extends React.Component{ state = { nome : '', email : '', senha : '', senhaReticao : '' } constructor(){ super() this.service = new UsuarioService(); } cadastrar = () => { //console.log(this.state) const usuario = { nome: this.state.nome, email: this.state.email, senha: this.state.senha } console.log(usuario) this.service.salvar(usuario) .then( response => { mensagemSucesso('usuario cadastrado com sucesso! Façao login para acessar o sistema') this.props.history.push('/login') }).catch( error => { console.log('entrou no erro') console.log(error.response.data) //this.setState({mensagemErro: erro.response.data}) mensagemErro(error.response.data) }) } cancelar = () => { this.props.history.push('/login') //direciona p pagina Login } render(){ return (
this.setState({nome: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({email: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({senha: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({senhaReticao: e.target.value}) } />
) } } export default withRouter(CadastroUsuario)
